reviewText:
In this 21st century, everyone knows and supports that The Innocent goes to the Child.
The guilty part must be the adult father who is the killer putting the baby in the cold
outside of the house.  He himself is a playboy.  But he cannot take this baby from his
wife with a now deceased man (a friend of his younger brother).  His wife is unfaithful
to him (as vice versa).  She goes through pregancy and labor --- truly faithful and mother
to the new-born.  The ending is acceptable: The guilty man committed suicide with a gun-shot.
His mistress then ran away to stay out any involvement.
